# Java File Instructions

## Code Style
- Follow standard Java naming convention
- Use 2 new lines between field assignment/declaration at class.
- Use 2 new lines between every 3 statements/expressions. 
- A single statement/expression that spans more than 3 lines should be separated from the following statement or expression by 2 new lines.
- Use `./gradlew spotlessApply` to format code
- Follow standard Java conventions (naming, braces, indentation, etc.)
